title: Implement Redis caching for participant profiles
description: Add Redis cache layer for participant profiles in InstagramApiService with cache key format instagram:profile:{participantPlatformId} and 24h TTL
dod: Redis cache integrated in getUserProfileById method
Cache TTL set to 86400 seconds (24 hours)
Cache-first logic: check cache before calling Instagram API
Profile data stored in cache after successful API call
Cache errors logged but don't block functionality (graceful fallback)
